title: Neville Croucher
deck:
Iâ€™m Neville. I am blessed & honoured to be married to Karen. Together we lead a life group on a Wednesday evening. I also have the privilege of being on the prayer team and the welcome team, and occasionally I preach at Gateway.

I have a passion for evangelism and this has taken me off to Malawi on 10 occasions so far, where along with a team of people we work with local churches to reach out to people who do not yet know Jesus.

Family is very important to me and I have recently become a Grandad.
